actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 212 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to the definition of treatment works.

summary.text: Revises the definition of the term "treatment works" in the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include within such definition methods or systems which treat waste from publicly owned water purification plants.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 212 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to the definition of treatment works.
